title.rendered: “Super Talent”: Mitchell Marsh On Promising Australia All-Rounder

content.rendered:
Mitchell Marsh, Australia’s T20 World Cup 2021 winning all-rounder has expressed no surprise over his compatriot Cameron Green’s stellar performance in his short career, where the wicket-keeper batter struck a half-century off just 19 balls against India in the recently concluded T20Is. Marsh praised the 23-year-old for showing his brilliance and powering Australia through his astonishing form at present.

People from the outside might be surprised but no one’s surprised internally. He’s a super talent. He was given a role to go out and be really aggressive, Marsh said.

Mitchell Marsh

Read also:India Were “Kind Of Preparing For This”: Ex Selector On Jasprit Bumrah Injury

Marsh praised the 23-year-old for showing his brilliance and powering Australia through his […]
